posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
Turkey red #96 Bob Groom. Graded PSA 4 MK.  The MK designation is due to a name and address stamped on the back.  Otherwise, this is a really beautiful card.  $390 delivered.

Turkey Red #104 Ed Lennox.  Graded PSA 2 MK. This card has a small ink mark on the right front border.  Nice card for the grade.  $270 delivered.

Scans available.
